Text: Corporate Underwriting Cc I am serving as a Board Member for the Houston Childrens Chorus The Chorus is presenting a Childrens Commemorative Concert on Sunday October th at Grace Presbyterian Church and has requested corporate underwriting in the amount of for the event Proceeds from a freewill offering will be given to the Red Cross education fund of the children whose parents died in the September New York tragedy Mr Steve Roddy has sent correspondence to your office in this regard and I hope that you will give his request serious consideration Thank you Arthur Goldsmith
